results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.

results.title: Australyaya Gelisiminhikayesi = Coming to Australia
results.creator_credit: Riza Guclu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Riza Guclu moved to Australia with his family, he was looking for a better life, like most immigrants. With that in mind, he learnt what he need to help him succeed.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Riza Guclu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Triptych
results.creator_credit: Walter Bird, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Walter Bird recalls a time when he was asked “Where are you from?”, and answered by describing where his house was situated in the neighbourhood. Growing up, he started to learn the implications of that question. He realised that he was ethnically different from other Australian-born children. Being the child of immigrants, Walter weighs up the positives and negatives of being a first generation Australian and shares his experiences when he finally travelled to his parents’ countries.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walter Bird, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Walter Bird recalls a time when he was asked “Where are you from?”, and answered by describing where his house was situated in the neighbourhood. Growing up, he started to learn the implications of that question. He realised that he was ethnically different from other Australian-born children. Being the child of immigrants, Walter weighs up the positives and negatives of being a first generation Australian and shares his experiences when he finally travelled to his parents’ countries.

Being the child of immigrants, Walter weighs up the positives and negatives of being a first generation Australian and shares his experiences when he finally travelled to his parents’ countries.

results.title: Prayer for fame
results.creator_credit: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Angela Josifoska, a teenager living in Melbourne’s western suburbs, tells of her quest for fame. She shares her early youth and the things that interested her throughout her life, culminating in a passion for performance. She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.

results.title: Old life, new life
results.creator_credit: Raelanah Loloa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For Raelanah Loloa, moving from the town where she grew up in New Zealand to start a new life in Australia was an experience both exciting and stressful. It was hard leaving all her friends and trying to make new ones but, eventually, Raelanah and her family were able to build a new life in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Raelanah Loloa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: For Raelanah Loloa, moving from the town where she grew up in New Zealand to start a new life in Australia was an experience both exciting and stressful. It was hard leaving all her friends and trying to make new ones but, eventually, Raelanah and her family were able to build a new life in Australia.

results.title: Never give up
results.creator_credit: Haris Fazlic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Haris Fazlic got sick of being larger than his classmates and took up exercising and, eventually, discovered his passion for wrestling. This passion has driven him to win many times despite having to overcome a major obstacle on the way. Wrestling has taught Haris that you should never give up on something you love, no matter what.

results.title: My special family
results.creator_credit: Erin Wilson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Erin Wilson pays tribute to her special family, a family who have taught her all about life. From her family, Erin has learnt responsibility, empathy, the realities of life and death and, most importantly, love and friendship. Here she pays tribute to the members of this special family.

results.title: Just smile and shine
results.creator_credit: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Anna Huynh tells of how she learned the hard way the pitfalls of trying to fit in. Looking different to everyone else, she tried doing everything her peers were doing and it took her further away from herself. In being true to herself, she discovered the true friendship and, ultimately, her true self.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

Looking different to everyone else, she tried doing everything her peers were doing and it took her further away from herself. In being true to herself, she discovered the true friendship and, ultimately, her true self.
